                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#加油武汉#</a>【“人民战‘疫’”公益海报|共渡难关<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/02/hot_wuhanjiayou_org.png" title="[武汉加油]" alt="[武汉加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】打赢疫情防控阻击战，我们在行动。各企业也第一时间纷纷加入驰援疫情防控队伍当中，展现出企业的社会责任与正气。人民网公益频道用“人民战‘疫’”公益海报记录这场全民防疫阻击战中的暖心时刻，为打赢这场人民守卫战加油助力。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IuNuMvoj5&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frenminwang&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609326235&amp;ssig=T%2F1DEJfVPv" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473401047481607" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuNuMvoj5?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 19:29" date="1582025384000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473401047481607:fromprofile"> 2月18日 19:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E5%86%B3%E5%AE%9A%E9%98%B6%E6%AE%B5%E6%80%A7%E5%87%8F%E5%85%8D%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A%E7%A4%BE%E4%BF%9D%E8%B4%B9%23&amp;from=default">#国务院决定阶段性减免企业社保费#</a>和实施<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A%E7%BC%93%E7%BC%B4%E4%BD%8F%E6%88%BF%E5%85%AC%E7%A7%AF%E9%87%91%23&amp;from=default">#企业缓缴住房公积金#</a>政策】国务院总理李克强2月18日主持召开国务院常务会议，部署不误农时切实抓好春季农业生产；决定阶段性减免企业社保费和实施企业缓缴住房公积金政策，多措并举稳企业稳就业。<br><br>会议指出，要贯彻党中央、国务院要求，统筹抓好疫情防控和 ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4473401047481607&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gc0s2navm6j20fr0frjs9" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263ly1gc0s2navm6j20fr0frjs9"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuNuMvoj5" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473401047481607:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473401047481607&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473400653762262" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuNu9fMJE?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 19:28" date="1582025290000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473400653762262:fromprofile"> 2月18日 19:28</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【世卫组织总干事：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E4%B8%80%E7%94%9F%E4%BB%8E%E6%9C%AA%E8%A7%81%E8%BF%87%E8%BF%99%E6%A0%B7%E7%9A%84%E5%8A%A8%E5%91%98%23&amp;from=default">#我一生从未见过这样的动员#</a>】“我一生中从未见过这样的动员。”世卫组织总干事谭德塞评价中国在疫情防控方面采取的措施，认为中国采取的很多防控措施远远超出应对突发事件的相关要求，为各国防疫工作设立了新标杆。他表示，相信中国能控制这场疫情。（央视）<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4473400653762262:2017607-video:2017607%3A4473400651874317:page_100206_home:2286908003:4473400653762262:2286908003" title="人民网的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h96oBK" alt="http://t.cn/A6h96oBK" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473398627712056" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuNqSwmg0?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 19:20" date="1582024807000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473398627712056:fromprofile"> 2月18日 19:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【国务院联防联控机制：精准实施<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%88%86%E5%8C%BA%E5%88%86%E7%BA%A7%E5%81%9A%E5%A5%BD%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%23&amp;from=default">#分区分级做好疫情防控工作#</a>】2月17日，国务院联防联控机制印发《关于科学防治精准施策分区分级做好新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的指导意见》。<br><br>《意见》指出，新冠肺炎疫情发生以来，在党中央集中统一领导下，各地各有关部门坚决贯彻落实党中央决策部署， ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4473398627712056&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gc0rpg9vv2j20fr0frjs9" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263ly1gc0rpg9vv2j20fr0frjs9"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuNqSwmg0" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473398627712056:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473398627712056&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

                                                                                                                        【中央指导组看望慰问武昌医院院长刘智明家属】2月18日上午，武汉市武昌医院党委副书记、院长刘智明在抗击新冠肺炎疫情中不幸感染，经全力救治无效，不幸逝世。当天下午，受中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理孙春兰委托，国家卫生健康委副主任于学军代表中央赴湖北指导组，前往武汉同济医院中法新城院 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuNoRu4fV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473397377166203:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473397377166203&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473396094250163" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuNmNhPF1?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 19:10" date="1582024203000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473396094250163:fromprofile"> 2月18日 19:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【全国妇联<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%BD%E6%8E%88%E5%BE%90%E8%BE%89%E9%BB%84%E5%92%8C%E8%89%B3%E5%A7%9C%E5%A8%9C%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E4%B8%89%E5%85%AB%E7%BA%A2%E6%97%97%E6%89%8B%23&amp;from=default">#追授徐辉黄和艳姜娜全国三八红旗手#</a>称号】全国妇联日前作出决定，追授徐辉、黄和艳、姜娜三位同志全国三八红旗手称号。决定指出，徐辉、黄和艳、姜娜三位同志把人民生命安全放在第一位，用生命兑现了入党誓言，用行动诠释和践行了初心使命，是全国广大妇女学习的榜样。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;徐辉，生前任 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuNmNhPF1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473396094250163:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473396094250163&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473393795373388" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuNj5mxRy?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 19:00" date="1582023655000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473393795373388:fromprofile"> 2月18日 19:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民网评：这哪是任性，这是在犯法】执意不戴口罩、恶意朝公共区域吐痰、谎报瞒报病情……凡此种种，既给公众情绪添堵，也给疫情防控添乱。战“疫”当前，践踏法律规定就是做病毒帮凶、与公众为敌。如果不懂得对自己负责，那就必须为违法担责。守住法律的底线，就是守护公共安全的红线；约束个人的行 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuNj5mxRy" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473393795373388:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473393795373388&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <!-- 时间 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473391296066040" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuNf3ps3m?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 18:50" date="1582023059000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473391296066040:fromprofile"> 2月18日 18:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AB%A6%E5%A8%A5%E5%9B%9B%E5%8F%B7%E7%8E%89%E5%85%94%E4%BA%8C%E5%8F%B7%E9%A1%BA%E5%88%A9%E5%94%A4%E9%86%92%23&amp;from=default">#嫦娥四号玉兔二号顺利唤醒#</a> 进入第十五月昼工作期】我国嫦娥四号着陆器和“玉兔二号”月球车又一次通过14天极低温考验，分别于2月18日6点57分和2月17日17点55分结束月夜“休眠”，受光照成功自主唤醒，进入第十五月昼工作期。目前确认各设备状态良好，工况正常，月球车将向西北再向西南移动，同步在 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuNf3ps3m" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473391296066040:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473391296066040&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

                                <a name="4473389261956272" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuNbM8cUM?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 18:42" date="1582022574000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473389261956272:fromprofile"> 2月18日 18:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【必胜！拔毒战队】在这场没有硝烟的战役中，每个人都是战士。无数人直面危险，勇敢逆行，举国上下众志成城。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E6%97%A5%E8%AE%B0%23&amp;from=default">#隔离日记#</a> 心在一起，便无所畏惧，快来加入“拔”毒战队，战胜病毒吧！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>（小游戏已消毒，请放心点击）<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6h9trfh" alt="http://t.cn/A6h9trfh" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473383590979794" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuN2D46T8?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 18:20" date="1582021222000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473383590979794:fromprofile"> 2月18日 18:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%B028%E5%8F%AA%E6%BF%92%E5%8D%B1%E9%B8%9F%E7%B1%BB%E5%8B%BA%E5%98%B4%E9%B9%AC%23&amp;from=default">#广东发现28只濒危鸟类勺嘴鹬#</a>】近日，广东湛江红树林国家级自然保护区管理局等相关单位开展珍稀鸟类的调查，发现28只全球极度濒危鸟类勺嘴鹬(yù)，还有6只黑脸琵鹭等珍稀鸟类。2008年《世界自然保护联盟濒危物种红色名录》将勺嘴鹬保护现状由濒危提升到最高濒危等级极危。（央视） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuN2D46T8" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473383590979794:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473383590979794&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473381145950531" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuMYGoY0j?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 18:10" date="1582020638000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473381145950531:fromprofile"> 2月18日 18:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【疫情期间你点外卖了吗？】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E6%9C%9F%E9%97%B4%E8%83%BD%E4%B8%8D%E8%83%BD%E7%82%B9%E5%A4%96%E5%8D%96%23&amp;from=default">#防疫期间能不能点外卖#</a>？配送外卖时盛放食物的容器，在平时清洁消毒要求的基础上增加频次，配送员的交通工具也应进行消毒。做好清洁消毒和防护，病毒通过外卖传播的可能性比较低。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#民民小调查#</a> 疫情期间你点外卖了吗？ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4473381145950531:1022-hudongvote:1022%3A2317162020_271812_-_076f93" title="人民网的微博投票" href="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_271812_-_076f93" alt="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_271812_-_076f93" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_vote">R</i>人民网的微博投票</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <!-- 对评论的操作 -->

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609326235&amp;ssig=T%2F1DEJfVPv" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473378355857953" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuMUbozV7?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 17:59" date="1582019973000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473378355857953:fromprofile"> 2月18日 17:59</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【国家邮政局：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%92%E4%B8%9A%E5%B7%B2%E6%81%A2%E5%A4%8D%E5%9B%9B%E6%88%90%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%23&amp;from=default">#快递业已恢复四成以上#</a>】快递业已经恢复正常产能4成以上。2月17日，全国快件揽收量1.12亿件，达到正常业务量的6成，投递量超过8000万件，超过正常业务量的4成。超过<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23200%E4%B8%87%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%92%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%A5%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%88%B0%E5%B2%97%23&amp;from=default">#200万快递小哥复工到岗#</a>。（人民日报客户端）<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6h92R1S" alt="http://t.cn/A6h92R1S" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%BB%E7%9F%B3%E5%85%AC%E4%B8%BB%E5%8F%B7%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E88%E5%90%8D%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#钻石公主号新增88名病例#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 日本厚生劳动省18日称，“钻石公主号”邮轮新增88名新冠肺炎患者。钻石公主号累计确诊542例新冠肺炎病例。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                            <div comment_id="4473613786766179" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">
                <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
                <div class="list_con">
                    <div class="WB_text">
                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5327490874" usercard="id=5327490874">嘤其蓝莲</a>：①非日本船，若乘客入境却不准入关，有歧视之嫌；若破例自由入关，得对其他邮轮一视同仁。 ②日本医疗资源配给及检测剂有限，无法短时间一一检测。 ③离日本首都圈近在咫尺，日本又缺乏相应的法律条例（如强制隔离无症状者），若新冠病毒在这个日本的经济中枢暴发，有可能令日本经济整                    </div>
                                        <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
                                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="comment_media_disp"></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473374090501505" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuMNj26sN?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 17:42" date="1582018957000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473374090501505:fromprofile"> 2月18日 17:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5684515819&amp;cid=4473374979422644&amp;nick=头发茂盛的孟同学&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月18日 17:46</div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473373054553085" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuMLDj6sR?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 17:38" date="1582018710000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473373054553085:fromprofile"> 2月18日 17:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%BC%BA%E8%B0%83%E4%B8%8B%E6%B0%B4%E9%81%93%E9%80%9A%E7%95%85%E6%9E%81%E4%B8%BA%E9%87%8D%E8%A6%81%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山强调下水道通畅极为重要#</a>】中国工程院院士钟南山18日在广东疫情防控新闻发布会上表示，防范新冠肺炎，保持下水道通畅极为重要。此前已经在粪便里发现新冠病毒。钟南山认为，“新冠病毒不是因为通过消化道进入感染，而是因为粪便干了后，又通过空气吸入感染，这是最合理的解释。”&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuMLDj6sR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473373054553085:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473373054553085&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5635942692&amp;cid=4473377709926608&amp;nick=挪威的雪松&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月18日 17:56</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473368621604658" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuMEu6JrA?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 17:20" date="1582017653000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473368621604658:fromprofile"> 2月18日 17:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%8E%E5%8D%974.1%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&amp;from=default">#济南4.1级地震#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%E5%8F%B0%E7%BD%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=中国地震台网">@中国地震台网</a> 正式测定：02月18日17时07分在山东济南市长清区（北纬36.47度，东经116.64度）发生4.1级地震，震源深度10千米。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%8E%E5%8D%97%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&amp;from=default">#济南地震#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2911913913&amp;cid=4473368843522520&amp;nick=荷尓蒙&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%A7%B0%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E4%BE%9D%E7%84%B6%E6%98%AF%E5%85%B3%E9%94%AE%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山称武汉依然是关键#</a>】18日，钟南山院士在广东省新闻发布会上表示，目前武汉依然是关键，八成病人在武汉，九成死亡在武汉，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%A1%A8%E7%A4%BA%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E8%BF%98%E6%B2%A1%E6%9C%89%E5%81%9C%E6%AD%A2%E4%BA%BA%E4%BC%A0%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山表示武汉还没有停止人传人#</a>。现在需要密切解决两个问题，①正常人和病人分开，②新冠肺炎病人和流感病人分开。如果老是混在一起，武汉用了很大人力财力，这个问题 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuMDWmag8" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473368285282656:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473368285282656&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4473368172573211" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuMDLaNpp?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 17:19" date="1582017546000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473368172573211:fromprofile"> 2月18日 17:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%B0%88%E7%94%A8%E5%BA%B7%E5%A4%8D%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E8%A1%80%E6%B5%86%E6%B2%BB%E7%96%97%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山谈用康复病人血浆治疗#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BA%B7%E5%A4%8D%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E8%A1%80%E6%B5%86%E6%B2%BB%E7%96%97%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E6%98%AF%E5%BE%88%E6%9C%89%E6%95%88%E7%9A%84%E6%96%B9%E6%B3%95%23&amp;from=default">#康复病人血浆治疗重症病人是很有效的方法#</a>】钟南山：我国用康复病人血浆治疗最早是在2005年，有1例H5N1患者用了之后康复。2009年，H1N1患者使用康复病人血浆和不使用的，在病死率上有明显差异。据我了解，武汉生物制品研究所现在做了10例，其中6例用药以后，病毒血症 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuMDLaNpp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473368172573211:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473368172573211&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5540618025" usercard="id=5540618025">云下穿海</a>：钟南山说：中药得具有抗病毒，在实验室里看到中药阻断病毒进入细胞膜，才能有效。那老头压根就不懂中医，乱在那里啥扯淡，乱弹琴。没一种中药是单纯抗病毒的，但是就是能让患瘟疫的病人好转痊愈。而你机械唯物主义医学（西医）到现在都没办法。这就是辩证唯物主义医学（中医）的高明之处。        </div>

                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/DG88888888" usercard="id=6084068993">艾宸栩</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>：回复<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%93%9D%E7%BF%94%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E7%94%9F%E4%B8%A5%E5%B5%A9?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=蓝翔毕业生严嵩">@蓝翔毕业生严嵩</a>:<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e9/2018new_woshou_org.png" title="[握手]" alt="[握手]" type="face"><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e9/2018new_woshou_org.png" title="[握手]" alt="[握手]" type="face"><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e9/2018new_woshou_org.png" title="[握手]" alt="[握手]" type="face">                    </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5540618025" usercard="id=5540618025">云下穿海</a>：钟南山说：中药得具有抗病毒，在实验室里看到中药阻断病毒进入细胞膜，才能有效。那老头压根就不懂中医，乱在那里啥扯淡，乱弹琴。没一种中药是单纯抗病毒的，但是就是能让患瘟疫的病人好转痊愈。而你机械唯物主义医学（西医）到现在都没办法。这就是辩证唯物主义医学（中医）的高明之处。        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%232020%E5%B9%B4%E6%B2%B9%E4%BB%B7%E7%AC%AC2%E6%AC%A1%E4%B8%8B%E8%B0%83%23&amp;from=default">#2020年油价第2次下调#</a>！明起加满一箱油少花16.5元】18日24时，汽油每吨下调420元，柴油每吨下调405元。全国平均来看：92号汽油每升下调0.33元；95号汽油每升下调0.34元；0号柴油每升下调0.34元。加满一箱92号汽油，将少花16.5元。本次调价是2020年国内成品油价第二次大幅下调。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E8%B4%A2%E7%BB%8F?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视财经">@央视财经</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473364493962101" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuMxPgCIR?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 17:04" date="1582016669000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473364493962101:fromprofile"> 2月18日 17:04</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【封闭管理：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%B1%B3%E9%9D%A2%E6%B2%B9%E8%82%89%E7%AD%89%E6%80%BB%E4%BD%93%E4%BE%9B%E5%BA%94%E7%A8%B3%E5%AE%9A%23&amp;from=default">#湖北米面油肉等总体供应稳定#</a> 】湖北省政府研究室主任覃道明：2月7日以来，国家连续投放冻猪肉2万多吨，湖北省米面肉等总体供应稳定。供应和配送渠道有了，办法也有了。关键是要改变生活习惯，少逛市场、能不出门就不出门，不给病毒半点可乘之机。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4473364493962101:1042163-video:1042163%3A4473364295909384:page_100206_home:2286908003:4473364493962101:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hKDpQa" alt="http://t.cn/A6hKDpQa" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月18日 17:15</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【封闭管理：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%98%BB%E9%9A%94%E6%98%AF%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%9F%BA%E7%A1%80%E6%80%A7%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%23&amp;from=default">#阻隔是疫情防控基础性工作#</a>】湖北省疫情防控工作新闻发布会提到<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%81%E9%97%AD%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E6%8A%93%E4%BD%8F4%E4%B8%AA%E4%BD%8F%23&amp;from=default">#封闭管理抓住4个住#</a>：①门要把住，守住小区门就是守住健康的大门；②车要管住，全面加强交通管制，采取严格的临时交通管制措施；③店要守住，所有非必须公共场所一律关闭；④人要看住，做到应查尽查，应收尽收，应检尽检， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuMtleXXE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473361713567086:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473361713567086&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E7%A3%B7%E9%85%B8%E6%B0%AF%E5%96%B9%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%8D%E6%98%AF%E7%89%B9%E6%95%88%E8%8D%AF%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山回应磷酸氯喹是不是特效药#</a>】2月18日下午，广东省举行新闻发布会，通报疫情防控相关情况。钟南山院士表示，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A3%B7%E9%85%B8%E6%B0%AF%E5%96%B9%E5%A4%9F%E4%B8%8D%E4%B8%8A%E7%89%B9%E6%95%88%E8%8D%AF%23&amp;from=default">#磷酸氯喹够不上特效药#</a>，但有治疗效果，副作用不大，值得研究和探讨。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4473360446453355:1042163-video:1042163%3A4473360177102868:page_100206_home:2286908003:4473360446453355:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hKrFGw" alt="http://t.cn/A6hKrFGw" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月18日 16:49</div>

                                <a name="4473358638460828" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuMonzv2Y?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 16:41" date="1582015272000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473358638460828:fromprofile"> 2月18日 16:41</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E8%BF%98%E5%AD%98%E5%9C%A8%E6%95%91%E6%B2%BB%E6%97%A0%E5%BA%8A%E7%8E%B0%E8%B1%A1%23&amp;from=default">#湖北还存在救治无床现象#</a>】湖北省委副秘书长、省委政研室（省改革办）主任钱远坤：当前，我们在有些地方还存在着救治不力、不早、无床的现象。是导致一些病人由轻症拖成重症，由重症拖成重危症，甚至死亡的一个非常重要的原因。所以<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BA%94%E6%94%B6%E5%B0%BD%E6%94%B6+%E5%88%BB%E4%B8%8D%E5%AE%B9%E7%BC%93%23&amp;from=default">#应收尽收 刻不容缓#</a>，也是阻断传播途径的治本之策。针对收治不力 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuMonzv2Y" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473358638460828:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473358638460828&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473357074178827" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuMlRhx6r?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 16:35" date="1582014900000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473357074178827:fromprofile"> 2月18日 16:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【他去世前最惦记的，是担心传给别人】18日下午15时左右，人民网记者赶到同济中法医院的时候，运送刘智明院长遗体的车已经缓缓启动，亲人、同事难掩悲痛。据身边人介绍，刘智明院长去世前最惦记的，是和他有过接触的人，担心传给别人。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473354578575741" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuMhPzYWp?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 16:25" date="1582014305000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473354578575741:fromprofile"> 2月18日 16:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E5%87%BA%E5%9B%9E%E5%AE%B6%E8%A1%A3%E6%9C%8D%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%B6%88%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#外出回家衣服如何消毒#</a>？】中国疾控中心环境所研究员张流波：①日常生活中，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%A1%E5%BF%85%E8%A6%81%E6%AF%8F%E5%A4%A9%E9%83%BD%E5%AF%B9%E5%A4%96%E5%A5%97%E6%B6%88%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#没必要每天都对外套消毒#</a>，回家后外套直接挂在门口，把外面穿的衣服和家内穿的衣服分开放即可。②若去过医院，外套可能会被感染的情况下，是需要对外套进行消毒处理的，但应尽量选用物理消毒方法为宜，如56度水温，30分钟 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuMhPzYWp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473354578575741:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473354578575741&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B6%88%E6%AF%92%E5%89%82%E8%AF%A5%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%23&amp;from=default">#消毒剂该如何使用#</a>：一定要适度】四点提示：①<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81%E5%B0%BD%E9%87%8F%E9%87%87%E7%94%A8%E7%89%A9%E7%90%86%E5%8A%A0%E6%B8%A9%E6%B6%88%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#物品尽量采用物理加温消毒#</a>，如56度热水30分钟可杀死病毒；②用化学消毒剂进行空气消毒，要在无人室内环境进行；③外环境表面有明确的局部环境受到传染源污染，用消毒剂做一次性消毒，不应反复喷洒； ④避免往人体大量喷洒消毒剂。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuMfJjaug" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473353274568548:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473353274568548&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%AA%E5%8F%91%E7%83%AD%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%8E%BB%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E7%9C%8B%E7%97%85%23&amp;from=default">#未发热病人如何去医院看病#</a>：一定要带医用口罩级别以上的口罩】中国疾控中心环境所研究员张流波：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%AA%E5%8F%91%E7%83%AD%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E5%8E%BB%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E7%9C%8B%E7%97%85%E7%9A%846%E7%82%B9%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%23&amp;from=default">#未发热病人去医院看病的6点建议#</a>①没有发热的病人去医院尽量避免到发热门诊去；②去医院之前，最好通过网上挂号，预约等等形式，来减少候诊时间；③到医院去一定要带医用口罩级别以上的口罩，外科口 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuMcennIB" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473351105572721:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473351105572721&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609326252&amp;ssig=QCenQgUcVU" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473348929105284" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuM8ICcHq?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 16:02" date="1582012957000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473348929105284:fromprofile"> 2月18日 16:02</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【直播：人民战 “疫”特别直播节目】国家卫健委统筹安排19个省份对口支援湖北。确定对口支援部署后，福建省选派“精兵强将”支援宜昌一线。疫情无情人有情，八闽儿女和湖北人民携手并肩，“宜建钟情”组合在荆楚大地打响了一场抗疫阻击战。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，共同关注↓↓<br> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4473348929105284:1034-video:1034%3A4474181295996972:page_100206_home:2286908003:4473348929105284:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hKQkD9" alt="http://t.cn/A6hKQkD9" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【直播：广东疫情防控发布会】2月18日16:00，广东省人民政府新闻办公室举行新闻发布会，通报广东省新冠肺炎疫情防控相关情况，重点介绍广东目前疫情防控科技攻关进展情况。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%8F%82%E5%8A%A0%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山参加广东疫情发布会#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，共同关注↓↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4473347914075463:1034-video:1034%3A4474066539577399:page_100206_home:2286908003:4473347914075463:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hKQPFS" alt="http://t.cn/A6hKQPFS" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6292983079" usercard="id=6292983079">中医志</a>：广东是一个非常重视传统文化的省份，在中医药传承方面也做得非常好，广州中医药大学就是一个很好的代表。广东地区的凉茶以及其它的中药，很多都是广州中医药大学的科研团队开发的。学校现在是世界一流学科建设高校，未来的发展会非常常的好。学校的中药学、制药工程、护理学等，都是很好的专业。        </div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2286908003&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4473346844211009"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>48</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4473346844211009&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B4%B5%E5%B7%9E%E9%80%81%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F520%E7%AE%B1%E7%94%9F%E6%B4%BB%E7%94%A8%E5%93%81%23&amp;from=default">#贵州送援鄂医疗队520箱生活用品#</a> 准备了热水袋等女性用品】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>2月15日，520个行李箱先后运抵贵州援助鄂州医疗队驻地。这些是贵州省委省政府为一线医护人员准备的暖心包，贴有性别、尺码标识。里面有电热毯、热水袋、保温杯等“暖”设备和日常用品，也准备了女性用品、吹风机等小物件 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuM2weqYR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473345083440309:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473345083440309&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【工信部提醒：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%9F%AD%E4%BF%A1%E5%8F%AF%E5%85%8D%E8%B4%B9%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E8%A1%8C%E7%A8%8B%E8%AF%81%E6%98%8E%23&amp;from=default">#短信可免费提供行程证明#</a>】为支持复产复工，帮助返岗复工的用户证明自己近期所到访过的地区，协助用工单位、社区管理进行流动人员的行程查验，在工业和信息化部统一组织下，中国电信、中国移动、中国联通为全国手机用户免费提供本人到访地短信查询服务，已于1月13日面向全国推广。用户 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuLYrvcvS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473342557436272:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473342557436272&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4473341106888003" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuLW6sTSP?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 15:31" date="1582011093000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473341106888003:fromprofile"> 2月18日 15:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【农村农业部：一些地方<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%9C%E6%9D%91%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E6%90%9E%E4%B8%80%E5%88%80%E5%88%87%E5%BD%B1%E5%93%8D%E5%86%9C%E4%BA%8B%E6%B4%BB%E5%8A%A8%23&amp;from=default">#农村防疫搞一刀切影响农事活动#</a>】农业农村部种植业管理司司长潘文博表示：受疫情影响，今年的春耕备耕遇到了一些新情况新问题：①部分农资企业，尚没有复工复产。当前不少地区农资企业开工需要当地疫情防控指挥部的批准，加上工人技术人员不能及时到位，企业正常的复工复产率比 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuLW6sTSP" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473341106888003:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473341106888003&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=6536929250&amp;screen_name=与孙先生异地恋的倒数呀" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月18日 15:31</div>

                                                                                                                        【直播：国务院联防联控机制新闻发布会】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，2月18日15时，国务院应对新冠肺炎疫情联防联控机制举行新闻发布会，介绍“菜篮子”稳产保供工作情况，敬请关注！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a><br> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4473333972549777:1034-video:1034%3A4473873517969416:page_100206_home:2286908003:4473333972549777:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hKKmhw" alt="http://t.cn/A6hKKmhw" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月18日 15:11</div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473332768386911" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuLIEzbOL?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 14:58" date="1582009105000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473332768386911:fromprofile"> 2月18日 14:58</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【武汉市金银潭医院院长<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E5%AE%9A%E5%AE%87%E5%A6%BB%E5%AD%90%E7%A8%8B%E7%90%B3%E6%8D%90%E7%8C%AE%E8%A1%80%E6%B5%86%23&amp;from=default">#张定宇妻子程琳捐献血浆#</a>】2月18日上午10点左右，武汉市金银潭医院迎来了一位特殊的献血浆者。她是该医院张定宇院长的妻子程琳女士。程琳女士带着同是新冠肺炎康复患者的同学来到武汉市金银潭医院献血点，经过一系列的问询、身体检查等评估，符合捐献血浆的要求，捐献400ML血浆 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuLIEzbOL" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473332768386911:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473332768386911&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473325168871286" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuLwoBdPg?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 14:28" date="1582007293000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473325168871286:fromprofile"> 2月18日 14:28</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【有啥给啥，拼了！】山东寿光的蔬菜、黑龙江的大米、内蒙古的土豆、广西的螺蛳粉、四川的儿菜……各地持续支援湖北，除捐赠医疗物资外，输送起特产美食来也是毫不含糊、按吨起步。这种“搬家式捐赠”的背后是中国式的牵挂，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E7%83%AD%E5%B9%B2%E9%9D%A2%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%23&amp;from=default">#为热干面加油#</a>！(人民网微信)<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4473325168871286:1022-article:1022%3A2309354473325211484324:page_100206_home:2286908003:4473325168871286:2286908003" title="有啥给啥，拼了！" href="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354473325211484324" alt="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354473325211484324" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>有啥给啥，拼了！</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4473321213259007" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuLq1dFOD?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-18 14:12" date="1582006350000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4473321213259007:fromprofile"> 2月18日 14:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E8%80%83%E7%A0%94%E6%88%90%E7%BB%A921%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83%23&amp;from=default">#湖北考研成绩21日起公布#</a>】2月18日，据湖北省教育考试院，湖北省2020年研考成绩将于2月21日起由各招生单位公布。成绩复查时间由招生单位确定，请考生密切关注所报考单位的相关信息。祝所有考研学子好运！顺利上岸！<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6hoox3z" alt="http://t.cn/A6hoox3z" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <li><span class="line S_line1"><a node-type="feed_list_commentTabAll" href="javascript:void(0)" action-type="feed_list_commentSearch" action-data="mid=4473318214087313&amp;filter=all" class="S_txt1">按时间</a></span></li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                            </div>
            <!-- 列表-标题 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E5%8C%BB%E5%8A%A1%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%AD%90%E5%A5%B3%E4%BB%8A%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%AD%E8%80%83%E5%8A%A010%E5%88%86%E5%BD%95%E5%8F%96%23&amp;from=default">#湖北一线医务人员子女今年中考加10分录取#</a>】日前，湖北发布《关于进一步关爱和激励新冠肺炎疫情防控一线医务人员的若干措施》提出，加强对一线医务人员的政策倾斜，2020年参加中考的一线医务人员子女，有关市州可在其录取总分基础上增加10分后参加中考招生录取。<br>若干措施提出，一线医务人员子女202 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuLhWmcU6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4473316205292822:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4473316205292822&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                 【世卫组织总干事：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\"                                                                                  【人民网评：这哪是任性，这是在犯法】执意不戴口罩、恶意朝公共区域吐痰、谎报瞒报病情……凡此种种，既给公众情绪添堵，也给疫情防控添乱。战“疫”当前，践踏法律规定就是做病毒帮凶、与公众为敌。如果不懂得对自己负责，那就必须为违法担责。守住法律的底线，就是守护公共安全的红线；约束个人的行 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2286908003\/IuNj5mxRy\" class=\"WB_text_opt\" suda-uatrack=\"key=original_blog_unfold&value=click_unfold:4473393795373388:2286908003\" action-type=\"fl_unfold\"                                               【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" 进入第十五月昼工作期】我国嫦娥四号着陆器和“玉兔二号”月球车又一次通过14天极低温考验，分别于2月18日6点57分和2月17日17点55分结束月夜“休眠”，受光照成功自主唤醒，进入第十五月昼工作期。目前确认各设备状态良好，工况正常，月球车将向西北再向西南移动，同步在 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"                                               【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%B028%E5%8F%AA%E6%BF%92%E5%8D%B1%E9%B8%9F%E7%B1%BB%E5%8B%BA%E5%98%B4%E9%B9%AC%23&from=default\">#广东发现28只濒危鸟类勺嘴鹬#<\/a>】近日，广东湛江红树林国家级自然保护区管理局等相关单位开展珍稀鸟类的调查，发现28只全球极度濒危鸟类勺嘴鹬(yù)，还有6只黑脸琵鹭等珍稀鸟类。2008年《世界自然保护联盟濒危物种红色名录》将勺嘴鹬保护现状由濒危提升到最高濒危等级极危。（央视） class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民网\">\n                                                                                                                        【国家邮政局：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%92%E4%B8%9A%E5%B7%B2%E6%81%A2%E5%A4%8D%E5%9B%9B%E6%88%90%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%23&from=default\">#快递业已恢复四成以上#<\/a>】快递业已经恢复正常产能4成以上。2月17日，全国快件揽收量1.12亿件，达到正常业务量的6成，投递量超过8000万件，超过正常业务量的4成。超过<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23200%E4%B8%87%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%92%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%A5%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%88%B0%E5%B2%97%23&from=default\">#200万快递小哥复工到岗#<\/a>。（人民日报客户端）<a suda-uatrack=\"key=minicard&value=pagelink_minicard_click\" title=\"网页链接\" href=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6h92R1S\" alt=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6h92R1S\" action-type=\"feed_list_url\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><i class=\"W_ficon ficon_cd_link\">O<\/i>网页链接<\/a> ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n                      <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->\n                \n\t\t\t\t \t\t    <!--picture_count == 1-->\n    <ul class=\"WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix\"
